verses.text_plain: And Jehoshaphat the king of Judah returned to his house in peace to Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 1And Jehoshaphat the king of Judah returned to his house in peace to Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: And Jehu the son of Hanani the seer went out to meet him, and said to king Jehoshaphat, Shouldest thou help the ungodly, and love them that hate the Lord? therefore is wrath upon thee from before the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 2And Jehu the son of Hanani the seer went out to meet him, and said to king Jehoshaphat, Shouldest thou help the ungodly, and love them that hate the Lord? therefore is wrath upon thee from before the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Nevertheless there are good things found in thee, in that thou hast taken away the groves out of the land, and hast prepared thine heart to seek God.
verses.verse_html: 3Nevertheless there are good things found in thee, in that thou hast taken away the groves out of the land, and hast prepared thine heart to seek God.

tokens.text: in thee, in that thou hast taken away

verses.text_plain: And Jehoshaphat dwelt at Jerusalem: and he went out again through the people from Beer–sheba to mount Ephraim, and brought them back unto the Lord God of their fathers.
verses.verse_html:
4And Jehoshaphat dwelt at Jerusalem: and he went out again through the people from Beer–sheba to mount Ephraim, and brought them back unto the Lord God of their fathers. ▼
▼ he went…: Heb. he returned and went out

footnotes.body_text: ▼ he went…: Heb. he returned and went out
footnotes.body_html: ▼ he went…: Heb. he returned and went out

verses.text_plain: And he set judges in the land throughout all the fenced cities of Judah, city by city,
verses.verse_html: 5And he set judges in the land throughout all the fenced cities of Judah, city by city,

verses.text_plain: And said to the judges, Take heed what ye do: for ye judge not for man, but for the Lord, who is with you in the judgment.
verses.verse_html:
6And said to the judges, Take heed what ye do: for ye judge not for man, but for the Lord, who is with you in the judgment. ▼
▼ in…: Heb. in the matter of judgment

footnotes.body_text: ▼ in…: Heb. in the matter of judgment
footnotes.body_html: ▼ in…: Heb. in the matter of judgment

verses.text_plain: Wherefore now let the fear of the Lord be upon you; take heed and do it: for there is no iniquity with the Lord our God, nor respect of persons, nor taking of gifts.
verses.verse_html: 7Wherefore now let the fear of the Lord be upon you; take heed and do it: for there is no iniquity with the Lord our God, nor respect of persons, nor taking of gifts.

verses.text_plain: Moreover in Jerusalem did Jehoshaphat set of the Levites, and of the priests, and of the chief of the fathers of Israel, for the judgment of the Lord, and for controversies, when they returned to Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 8Moreover in Jerusalem did Jehoshaphat set of the Levites, and of the priests, and of the chief of the fathers of Israel, for the judgment of the Lord, and for controversies, when they returned to Jerusalem.

verses.text_plain: And he charged them, saying, Thus shall ye do in the fear of the Lord, faithfully, and with a perfect heart.
verses.verse_html: 9And he charged them, saying, Thus shall ye do in the fear of the Lord, faithfully, and with a perfect heart.

verses.text_plain: And what cause soever shall come to you of your brethren that dwell in their cities, between blood and blood, between law and commandment, statutes and judgments, ye shall even warn them that they trespass not against the Lord, and so wrath come upon you, and upon your brethren: this do, and ye shall not trespass.
verses.verse_html: 10And what cause soever shall come to you of your brethren that dwell in their cities, between blood and blood, between law and commandment, statutes and judgments, ye shall even warn them that they trespass not against the Lord, and so wrath come upon you, and upon your brethren: this do, and ye shall not trespass.

tokens.text: come upon you, and upon your brethren

verses.text_plain: And, behold, Amariah the chief priest is over you in all matters of the Lord; and Zebadiah the son of Ishmael, the ruler of the house of Judah, for all the king’s matters: also the Levites shall be officers before you. Deal courageously, and the Lord shall be with the good.
verses.verse_html:
11And, behold, Amariah the chief priest is over you in all matters of the Lord; and Zebadiah the son of Ishmael, the ruler of the house of Judah, for all the king’s matters: also the Levites shall be officers before you. Deal courageously, and the Lord shall be with the good. ▼
▼ Deal…: Heb. Take courage and do

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Deal…: Heb. Take courage and do
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Deal…: Heb. Take courage and do
